mapper.select: SELECT master.empNm name, IFNULL((round((sum(member.like_yn = 1) * 100/ count(member.like_yn)),1)),0) evaluation, detail.polyNm party, master.origNm election, master.reeleGbnNm electioncnt, detail.shrtNm committee FROM rest_lawmaker_inquiry master LEFT JOIN rest_lawmaker_inquiry_detail detail ON master.num = detail.num LEFT JOIN member_like_lawmaker member ON master.num = member.lawmaker_id GROUP BY master.empNm
